title: Trade Lingo: 'Aunt Minnie' Lives In Your X-Rays
teaser: All Things Considered has been asking listeners to share words exclusive to their professions. In the latest installment, radiologist Dr. Harold Friedman defines what seeing an "Aunt Minnie" on a brain scan might mean.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
